vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Apache Log4j2 contains a vulnerability where a remote attacker can execute arbitrary code.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply updates per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if updates are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Outlook Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Outlook contains an elevation of privilege vulnerability that can be exploited to gain access to a user's Net-NTLMv2 hash.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Example product contains a vulnerability that allows remote code execution.
